messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Learning styles and homeschooling methods
messages.msgSnippet: I m also new to the group and to homeschooling and wanted to add my two cents worth !  I have fallen in love with the idea of unschooling (and have begun
messages.messageBody:
I'm also new to the group and to homeschooling and wanted to add my "two
cents' worth"! I have fallen in love with the idea of unschooling (and have
begun implementation) because that is exactly how my daughter learns. She
dives into a subject that interests her and becomes an expert. If only I
had discovered this sooner! I do love this group and am so glad I found
y'all!!

Cherry from Louisiana
